vb11:1.2_0: sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.
vb11:2.2_0: Dukkhe ñāṇaṁ, dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṁ, dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṁ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṁ—
vb11:4.2_0: Musāvādā veramaṇī, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī, samphappalāpā veramaṇī—
vb11:5.2_0: Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī, adinnādānā veramaṇī, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī—
vb11:6.2_0: Idha ariyasāvako micchāājīvaṁ pahāya sammāājīvena jīvikaṁ kappeti—
vb11:7.2_0: Idha bhikkhu anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anuppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati,
vb11:7.3_0: uppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati,
vb11:7.4_0: anuppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati,
vb11:7.5_0: uppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati—
vb11:8.2_0: Idha bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ,
vb11:8.3_0: vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ,
vb11:8.4_0: citte cittānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ,
vb11:8.5_0: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ—
vb11:9.2_0: Idha bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
vb11:9.3_0: vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
vb11:9.4_0: pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedeti, yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhanti “upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī”ti tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
vb11:9.5_0: sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati—
vb11:10.2_0: sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.
vb11:11.2_0: Idha bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ,
vb11:11.9_0: sammāsamādhiṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
vb11:13.2_0: sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.
vb11:14.2_0: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb11:14.2_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti—
vb11:15.2_1: amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb11:16.2_0: Yo takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā cetaso abhiniropanā sammāsaṅkappo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb11:17.2_0: Yā catūhi vacīduccaritehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṁ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto sammāvācā maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb11:18.2_0: Yā tīhi kāyaduccaritehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṁ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto sammākammanto maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb11:19.2_0: Yā micchāājīvā ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṁ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto sammāājīvo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb11:20.2_0: Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho …pe… sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb11:21.2_0: Yā sati anussati …pe… sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb11:22.2_0: Yā cittassa ṭhiti …pe… sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb11:24.2_0: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb11:24.2_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo hoti—
vb11:25.2_1: amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb11:26.2_0: Yo takko vitakko …pe… sammāsaṅkappo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb11:27.2_0: Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho …pe… sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb11:28.2_0: Yā sati anussati …pe… sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb11:29.2_0: Yā cittassa ṭhiti …pe… sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb11:31.2_0: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb11:31.2_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā …pe…
vb11:31.2_2: amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb11:32.2_0: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb11:32.2_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti …pe…
vb11:34.2_0: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb11:34.2_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe…
vb11:34.4_0: Tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṁ vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb11:34.4_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ suññataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti—
vb11:36.2_0: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb11:36.2_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe…
vb11:36.4_0: Tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṁ vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb11:36.4_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ suññataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo hoti—
vb11:38.2_0: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb11:38.2_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe…
vb11:38.4_0: Tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṁ vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb11:38.4_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ suññataṁ, yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā …pe…
vb11:38.4_2: amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb11:39.2_0: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb11:39.2_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe…
vb11:39.4_0: Tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṁ vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb11:39.4_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ suññataṁ, yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb11:41.2_0: sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.
vb11:42.1_0: Aṭṭhannaṁ maggaṅgānaṁ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā …pe… kati saraṇā, kati araṇā?
vb11:44.2_0: satta maggaṅgā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā.
vb11:48.2_0: satta maggaṅgā siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkaavicārā.
vb11:49.2_0: satta maggaṅgā siyā pītisahagatā, siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā upekkhāsahagatā.
vb11:58.1_0: Na maggārammaṇā, siyā maggahetukā, siyā maggādhipatino;
vb11:59.1_0: Siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā, siyā uppādino.
vb11:60.1_0: Siyā atītā, siyā anāgatā, siyā paccuppannā.
vb11:62.1_0: Siyā ajjhattā, siyā bahiddhā, siyā ajjhattabahiddhā.
vb11:65.1_0: Sammādiṭṭhi hetu, satta maggaṅgā na hetū, sahetukā, hetusampayuttā.
vb11:65.2_0: Sammādiṭṭhi hetu ceva sahetukā ca, satta maggaṅgā na vattabbā “hetū ceva sahetukā cā”ti, sahetukā ceva na ca hetū.
vb11:65.3_0: Sammādiṭṭhi hetu ceva hetusampayuttā ca, satta maggaṅgā na vattabbā “hetū ceva hetusampayuttā cā”ti, hetusampayuttā ceva na ca hetū.
vb11:65.4_0: Satta maggaṅgā na hetū sahetukā, sammādiṭṭhi na vattabbā “na hetu sahetukā”tipi, “na hetu ahetukā”tipi.
vb11:67.4_0: Na vattabbā “āsavā ceva sāsavā cā”tipi, “sāsavā ceva no ca āsavā”tipi.
vb11:67.5_0: Na vattabbā “āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttā cā”tipi, “āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā”tipi.
vb11:70.7_0: Sammāsaṅkappo avitakko, satta maggaṅgā siyā savitakkā, siyā avitakkā.
vb11:70.8_0: Sammāsaṅkappo savicāro, satta maggaṅgā siyā savicārā, siyā avicārā.
vb11:70.9_0: Sammāsaṅkappo sappītiko, satta maggaṅgā siyā sappītikā, siyā appītikā.
vb11:70.10_0: Sammāsaṅkappo pītisahagato, satta maggaṅgā siyā pītisahagatā, siyā na pītisahagatā.
vb11:70.11_0: Sammāsaṅkappo sukhasahagato, satta maggaṅgā siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā na sukhasahagatā.
vb11:70.12_0: Sammāsaṅkappo na upekkhāsahagato, satta maggaṅgā siyā upekkhāsahagatā, siyā na upekkhāsahagatā.
